name: The Amazons
startIntroPart1: Otrera is the founder and first Queen of the Amazons, female warriors and hunters known for their physical agility, strength, archery, riding skills, and the arts of combat. She is the consort of Ares, the god of war, as well as mother of Hippolyta, Antiope, Lysippa, Melanippa and Penthesilea. She is also considered as the founder of the Temple of Artemis at Ephesus.
startIntroPart2: O Otrera, leader of the Amazons, thou shalt overwhelm the world!
declaringWar: We Amazons will wage war to raze your country.
defeated: My people will mourn me not with tears, but with human blood.
denounced: Do you know who you're dealing with?
attacked: Thou shalt be fosaken by the gods for thy deeds!
introduction: Welcome stranger!, I am Otrera, the founder and Queen of the Amazons.
tradeRequest: Let's do business. This is better than you deserve.
